mapper.select: select * from comments order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into comments (id, rate, content, com_date, likes, user_id, act_id) values (#{id}, #{rate}, #{content}, #{com_date}, #{likes}, #{user_id}, #{act_id})
mapper.update: update comments set rate=#{rate}, content=#{content}, com_date=#{com_date}, likes=#{likes}, user_id=#{user_id}, act_id=#{act_id} where id=#{id}
